amendment.description: Amendment expresses the the sense of the Congress regarding the mathematics and science partnership programs of the Department of Education and the National Science Foundation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to state the sense of the Congress regarding the mathematics and science partnership programs of the Department of Education and the National Science Foundation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ehlers amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Ehlers.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ehlers amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
